statements: SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT card_holder_name, transaction_type FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE card_number = '1234 5678 9101 1121';
SELECT transaction_id, card_holder_name, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE card_holder_name = 'Alice' AND transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT card_number FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'refund' AND transaction_amount < 0
SELECT transaction_id, card_holder_name, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND transaction_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*), MIN(transaction_amount), MAX(transaction_amount) FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' GROUP BY card_holder_name ORDER BY card_holder_name ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT card_number FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_detected_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, card_number FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' AND card_number LIKE '1234%'
SELECT t.*, a.anomaly_type FROM transactions t JOIN anomalies a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC
SELECT card_number, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY card_number HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE card_number IN ('1234567890123456', '9876543210987654') AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_profile;
SELECT detection_type, detection_timestamp FROM fraud_detection;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer_profile;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE card_number LIKE '1234%'

SELECT c.customer_name, f.detection_type, ct.transaction_amount FROM customer_profile c JOIN fraud_detection f ON c.customer_id = f.detection_id JOIN credit_card_transactions ct ON f.transaction_id = ct.transaction_id
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_profile WHERE customer_phone = '123-456-7890'

SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_name FROM customer_profile c JOIN fraud_detection f ON c.customer_id = f.detection_id JOIN credit_card_transactions ct ON f.transaction_id = ct.transaction_id WHERE transaction_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT merchant_name, category FROM merchants ORDER BY merchant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT merchant_name, category FROM merchants WHERE category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY merchant_name;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, card_number FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY anomaly_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT cardholder_name, card_type FROM cardholders ORDER BY card_type DESC;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT merchant_name, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE merchant_name = 'Amazon' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT flag_reason, flag_date FROM card_fraud_flags WHERE flag_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, card_type FROM cardholders WHERE card_type = 'Gold' ORDER BY cardholder_name ASC;
SELECT flag_reason, flag_date FROM card_fraud_flags WHERE flag_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY flag_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, audit_type FROM transaction_audit_logs WHERE audit_type LIKE '%balance%' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious' ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
